trans-unit.source: Converts instances of the <see cref="T:System.String" /> type to and from <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily" /> instances.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="T:System.String" /> 类型的实例与 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily" /> 实例之间进行转换。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.FontFamilyConverter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.FontFamilyConverter" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Describes the context information of a type.
trans-unit.target: 描述类型的上下文信息。

trans-unit.source: The type of the source that is being evaluated for conversion.
trans-unit.target: 正被计算用于转换的源类型。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether a class can be converted from a given type to an instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily" />.
trans-unit.target: 确定是否可将一个类从特定类型转换成 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily" /> 实例。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the converter can convert from the specified type to an instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果转换器可从指定类型转换成 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily" /> 的实例，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamilyConverter> supports conversion to and from the <xref:System.String> type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamilyConverter> 支持转换到和从<xref:System.String>类型。

trans-unit.source: Describes the context information of a type.
trans-unit.target: 描述类型的上下文信息。

trans-unit.source: The desired type that this instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily" /> is being evaluated for conversion.
trans-unit.target: 正被计算用于转换的此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily" /> 实例的所需类型。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether an instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily" /> can be converted to a different type.
trans-unit.target: 确定是否可将 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily" /> 的实例转换成不同类型。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the converter can convert this instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily" /> to the specified type; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果转换器可以将此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily" /> 实例转换为指定类型，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Conversion is possible only if `context` is a <xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily> type, and `destinationType` is a <xref:System.String> type.
trans-unit.target: 转换是可能仅当`context`是<xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily>类型，和`destinationType`是<xref:System.String>类型。

trans-unit.source: In addition, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily.Source%2A> property for `context` cannot be null or equal to <xref:System.String.Empty>, which identifies `context` as an anonymous <xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily>.
trans-unit.target: 此外，<xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily.Source%2A>属性`context`不能为 null 或等于<xref:System.String.Empty>，它标识`context`为匿名<xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily>。

trans-unit.source: Describes the context information of a type.
trans-unit.target: 描述类型的上下文信息。

trans-unit.source: Cultural-specific information that should be respected during conversion.
trans-unit.target: 转换过程中应考虑的区域性特定信息。

trans-unit.source: The object being converted.
trans-unit.target: 要转换的对象。

trans-unit.source: Attempts to convert a specified object to an instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily" />.
trans-unit.target: 试图将指定对象转换为 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily" /> 实例。

trans-unit.source: The instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily" /> that is created from the converted <paramref name="o" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 从已转换的 <paramref name="o" /> 参数创建的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily" /> 实例。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamilyConverter> supports conversion to and from the <xref:System.String> type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamilyConverter> 支持转换到和从<xref:System.String>类型。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="o" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="o" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="o" /> is not <see langword="null" /> and is not a valid type that can be converted to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="o" /> 不是 <see langword="null" />，而且不是可转换为 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily" /> 的有效类型。

trans-unit.source: Describes the context information of a type.
trans-unit.target: 描述类型的上下文信息。

trans-unit.source: Cultural-specific information that should be respected during conversion.
trans-unit.target: 转换过程中应考虑的区域性特定信息。

trans-unit.source: The object being converted.
trans-unit.target: 要转换的对象。

trans-unit.source: The type that this instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily" /> is converted to.
trans-unit.target: 此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily" /> 实例被转换成的类型。

trans-unit.source: Attempts to convert a specified object to an instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily" />.
trans-unit.target: 试图将指定对象转换为 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily" /> 实例。

trans-unit.source: The object that is created from the converted instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily" />.
trans-unit.target: 从 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily" /> 的已转换实例创建的对象。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamilyConverter> supports conversion to and from the <xref:System.String> type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamilyConverter> 支持转换到和从<xref:System.String>类型。

trans-unit.source: Occurs if <paramref name="value" /> or <paramref name="destinationType" /> is not a valid type for conversion.
trans-unit.target: 当 <paramref name="value" /> 或 <paramref name="destinationType" /> 不是有效的转换类型时发生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs if <paramref name="value" /> or <paramref name="destinationType" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="value" /> 或 <paramref name="destinationType" /> 为 <see langword="null" />，则发生。
